qrCode.title: Machine QR code access
qrCode.message: This allows the user to access the machine data using the assigned QR code instead of the login credentials provided.
qrCode.checkHasFacilityAssigned: You have to assign this machine to a facility first

labels.nameError: Name can not be more than 75 characters
labels.serialError: Serial number can not be more than 75 characters

edit.qrCodeMessage: This allows reporters to open an app with scanning the machine QR code instead using sing in credentials.

imageUpload.fileTooLarge: Image is too large. Image size should be less than 10MB

window.title: Are you sure you want to delete this machine? This action cannot be reversed

edit.imageUploadError: Something went wrong with image upload

historyTab.noHistoryMessage: There is no machine history for this machine.
historyTab.ticketsRelated: work orders related to this machine

noProductionLines: There is no production line available for use.
noMachineTemplates: There is no machine template available for use.

machineTemplateInfo.title: This is a machine template, if you create a new machine based on this template:
machineTemplateInfo.bullet1: All documentation of the newly created machine will be synced with the documentation from the template.
machineTemplateInfo.bullet2: The machine picture and description will be synced with the picture from the template.

lineTemplateInfo.title: This is a line template, if you create a new machine based on this template:
lineTemplateInfo.bullet1: All documentation of the newly created machine will be synced with the documentation from the template.
lineTemplateInfo.bullet2: Machine picture and description have to be created for the machine separately.

templateAccessDeniedModalTitle: If you want to use the machine template feature, please contact
totalMachineCreatedLabel: machines have been created from this template
templateDeleteAtertText: Are you sure you want to delete this template?
machinePartsAddFailed: Failed to add parts for this machine
machinePartRemoveFailed: Failed to remove parts from this machine
noMachinePartsFound: There is no parts assigned to this machine.
qrScanSignOutInfo: By signing in to this facility, you will be signed out from the current one.
